entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
